name: Rapid Strike Scroll of the Flying Dragon
rules: The Rapid Strike Pokémon this card is attached to can use the attack on this card. (You still need the necessary Energy to use this attack.)
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.
Attach a Pokémon Tool to 1 of your Pokémon that doesn't already have a Pokémon Tool attached.

attacks.name: Meteor
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 90 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
